nodes.text: Fondor Station was a wheel-shaped space station that served as a shipyard and dock for Imperial vessels such as Star Destroyers and belonged to the Fondor Shipyards, a collection of several similarly shaped space stations above the planet Fondor. Shortly after the Battle of Endor, Moff Raythe was docked at the station on the Star Destroyer Dauntless to extract experimental weather satellites for Operation: Cinder. Not long after, the Rebel Alliance attacked the station, but were defeated.
